column6:
When a major fast food restaurant launches a "Good Taste Need Not Be Alien" advertising campaign, it hires a few aliens for publicity. But who's the marketing genius who thought Null the Living Darkness would make a good employee? And why won't anybody fire him? Battle lines are drawn at a fast food counter when the Fantastic Four stand between hungry citizens and an incredibly powerful, and incredibly belligerent, fast food cashier in, "Would You Like Living Darkness With That?",2009,1
All Ages ...$2.99
column8: | penciller:Tom Grummett | inker:David Hahn | letterer:Nate Piekos | colorist:Chris Sotomayor | writer:Paul Tobin
